akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 94–455, title VII, § 701(d)(1), Oct. 4, 1976, 90 Stat. 1578]

akn:content.akn:p:
[§ 669. Repealed. Pub. L. 94–455, title VII, § 701(d)(1), Oct. 4, 1976, 90 Stat. 1578]
Section, acts Oct. 16, 1962, Pub. L. 87–834, § 7(e), 76 Stat. 986; Dec. 30, 1969, Pub. L. 91–172, title III, § 331(a), 83 Stat. 596, related to the treatment of capital gain deemed distributed in preceding years.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal applicable to distributions made in taxable years beginning after Dec. 31, 1975, see section 701(h) of Pub. L. 94–455, set out as an Effective Date of 1976 Amendment note under section 667 of this title.
